Articles.Content:
Not only can this airplane land on water, but it can turn on a dime, practically hover, and even fly backwards. Watch the whole video; the real crazy stuff happens toward the end!

Mods used:
-B9 Aerospace
-Infernal Robotics

Unfortunately, my KSP stopped working shortly after I recorded this, and when I re-installed, my files went missing. So I can not provide a craft file. This video is the only testament to this plane's glory;.;

Anyway, I hope you all enjoy it, and thanks for checking it out!

GATOR
Some would say tashes are coming back into style. I say they never went out. Nice driving!

yes, well as the construction of this particular aircraft was overseen by Wernher Von Kerman, one can't really be surprised...

But anyway, thank you! That thing really was fun to fly. I'm gonna miss it;.;
